issue.title: Unexpected behavior on ajaxValidation when prettyUrl = false

labels.name: status:to be verified
labels.description: Needs to be reproduced and validated.

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?

Create an ActiveForm with `ajaxValidation` set to true, method `GET` and a custom `validationUrl`.
### What is the expected result?

ActiveForm should call the custom `validationUrl` uppon ajax validation.
### What do you get instead?

ActiveForm triggers an an ajax validation request to the form url.
### Additional info

The hidden field with the current route added to the form overrides the `validationUrl`.

| Q | A |
| --- | --- |
| Yii version | 2.0.8 |
| PHP version | 5.6.22 |
| Operating system | Fedora 23 |

issue.title: Reverted fix of beforeValidate event calling in `yii.activeForm.js`

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
| Q | A |
| --- | --- |
| Is bugfix? | yes |
| New feature? | no |
| Breaks BC? | yes (fixes) |
| Fixed issues | #10681, #11972, probably #11992 |

I'm reverting @lynicidn commit e8bcb93 because it introduces buggy behavior. The problem that was reported in #10681 is not a bug indeed.
1. From the docs: 
   > beforeValidate event is triggered before validating the whole form
2. AJAX validation is being executed each time for all available inputs, but the result of AJAX validation will be used for each particular input only when it was touched at least once. It means, that each AJAX validation call does not mean full form validation.
3. For Ajax validation we have `ajaxBeforeSend` and `ajaxComplete` events

@nkovacs, @samdark, @githkim, @lynicidn - if you have something to add - feel free to text your ideas. Otherwise, the PR will be merged in 3 days.

Thank you
